turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Wizard101.
turn.2: Wizard101  Wizard101 is a 2008 massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) created by KingsIsle Entertainment.
turn.4: In the game, players take on the role of students of Ravenwood School of Magical Arts in order to save the Spiral, the fictional galaxy in which the game is set, from various threats.
turn.6: Players battle enemies by casting spells using a wand or staff or hammer in a turn-based combat system similar to collectible card games.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: "Pirate101", a sister MMORPG set in the same universe, was released in 2012.
turn.10: The fictional universe of the Spiral is divided into many worlds, each of which has multiple areas.
turn.11: Is there anything else of importance?
turn.12: Players can unlock these temporarily with "memberships," or unlock each area permanently with the game's premium currency ""Crowns".
